resources.string: Datta means the first Energetic Incarnation with which the unimaginable God merged perfectly.

His Holiness Shri Datta Swami is a world-renowned Master of spiritual knowledge and is believed to be a complete incarnation of God Datta by His close devotees. He explains that \"There is only one God who revealed Himself in different human forms across the world and at different times to preach the same spiritual knowledge in different languages and cultures\"
